---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 


2^50 + -2^2 *2^10 = 1125899906838528


01010
R10 gets 2^50 in its slices.

LI R10 with 0000000000000100 at index 7 - 111
LI R10 with 0000000000000100 at index 3 - 011

00101
R5 gets -2^2 in its slices.

LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 0  - 000
LI R5 with 1111111111111111 at index 1  - 001
LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 4  - 100
LI R5 with 1111111111111111 at index 5 -  101


00001
R1 gets 2^10 in its slices.

LI R1 with 0000010000000000 at index 0  - 000
LI R1 with 0000010000000000 at index 4  - 100
 
Opcode





0111000000000000010001010
0011000000000000010001010
0000111111111111110000101
0001111111111111111100101
0100111111111111110000101
0101111111111111111100101
0000000001000000000000001
0100000001000000000000001
1010000001001010101000000



passes.

---------------------------------------------------
